question: Display all ballrooms and greenrooms for 100 people.
sql_query1:
SELECT Ballrooms.name
FROM Ballrooms
WHERE Ballrooms.seating_capacity = 100
UNION
SELECT GreenRooms.name
FROM GreenRooms
WHERE GreenRooms.seating_capacity = 100
sql_query2:
SELECT Ballrooms.name
FROM Ballrooms
UNION
SELECT GreenRooms.name
FROM GreenRooms
WHERE GreenRooms.seating_capacity = 100
interpretation1: ballrooms can accommodate 100 people and which greenrooms have the same capacity?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all ballrooms and also provide a list of greenrooms for 100 people.
